metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Andrés, J A
Garmendia Larrea, J C
Sanz Jaka, J P
López García, J A
Arocena Lanz, F
Martínez de Lizarduy, J L
metadata.dc:description: A case of lithiasis in a front diverticulum of the urethra in male is presented. The unusual presentation it had together with the lack of frequency was pointed out, commenting briefly the diagnostic methods and ways of treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Gran litiasis en un diverticulo de uretra anterior.
[Giant calculus in a diverticulum of the anterior urethra].
